## Ways to Contribute

- **Bug Reports**  
  Report bugs using the [Bug Report template](/issues/new/choose).

- **Code Contributions**  
  See the [Pull Request](#pull-request) section below.

## Pull Request

1. **Create or Find an Issue**  
   Make sure there is an existing issue, or create one, before starting work.

2. **Code Style**  
   Follow the existing project code style.

3. **Testing**  
   Test your changes thoroughly.

4. **Reference the Issue**  
   Include the related issue number (e.g. `#123`) in your pull request.

5. **Submit the PR**  
   Keep your pull request clear, concise, and descriptive.

## Questions?

Use the [Discussions Q&A](https://github.com/cxdzc/TornAPIWrapper/discussions/new/choose) for questions or general discussion.

**Thank you for contributing!**
